code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useLocation,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Search(){const location=useLocation();const navigate=useNavigate();const[keyword,setKeyword]=useState("");const searchHandler=e=>{e.preventDefault();navigate("/search/".concat(keyword));};const clearkeyword=()=>{setKeyword("");};useEffect(()=>{if(location.pathname=='/'){clearkeyword();}},[location]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{onSubmit:searchHandler,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"search_field",className:"form-control",placeholder:"Enter Product Name ...",onChange:e=>{setKeyword(e.target.value);},value:keyword}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"input-group-append",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"search_btn",className:"btn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-search","aria-hidden":"true"})})})]})});}
